naslov: Šestine - kuća za najam (400 m2) sa VRTOM I 2 GARAŽE - 4 spavaće (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Agenija Zagreb4U Vam predstavlja samostojeću kuću veličine 400 m2 koja se sastoji od suterena, prvog kata i potkrovlja. Kuća je na lijepom mjestu u podsljemenskoj zoni - Šestinski vrh. VIRTUALNA ŠETNJA: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/0933/ U sklopu kuće nalaze se dvije garaže u koju se mogu parkirati ukupno 4 vozila, a ispred garaža ima još parking za 2 vozila. Kuća ima predivnu veliku ljetnu terasu sa vrtnim roštiljem, te pristup na vrt. LINK SA SVE FOTOGRAFIJE: https://www.zagreb4u.com/sestine-kuca-za-najam-400-m2-sa-vrtom-i-2-garaze-4-spavace-933.1 Cijela kuća je klimatizirana i ima etažno plinski centralno. RASPORED PO ETAŽAMA: U suterenu se nalazi kotlovnica, vešeraj i pomoćne prostorije, a u prizemlju je kuhinja, veliki dnevni boravak sa izlazom na vrt, blagovaona i kupaona. Na katu se nalaze 4 spavaće sobe i kupaona. OPREMA KUĆE: U kupaoni se nalazi jacuzzi kada i hidromasažni tuš. Kamin se nalazi u sklopu dnevnog boravka. Kuhinja je kompletno opremljena sa svim aparatima. Kolni ulaz u dvorište se otvara na daljinsko upravljanje. Video portafon. Stanica busa je u blizini kuće na cca 100m. UOBIČAJENI UVJETI NAJMA: * Ugovor na rok od minimalno godinu dana * Plaćanje: 1 mjesec unaprijed * Sigurnosni polog: 1 mjesečne najamnine AGENT: Darko +385 95 351 2309 ili darko@zagreb4u.com AGENCIJSKA PROVIZIJA OD NAJMOPRIMCA: 1 MJESEČNA NAJAMNINA + PDV -------------------------------------------------------------- Agency Zagreb4U presents you a detached house with a size of 400 m2, which consists of a basement, a first floor and an attic. The house is in a beautiful location in the podsljemen zone - Šestinski vrh. VIRTUAL WALK: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/0933/ LINK FOR ALL PHOTOS: https://www.zagreb4u.com/sestine-4-bedroom-2-bathroom-house-400-m2-with-garden-and-2-garages-933.1 Within the house there are two garages where you can park a total of 4 vehicles, and in front of the garage there is another parking space for 2 vehicles. The house has a beautiful large summer terrace with a garden grill, and access to the garden. The entire house is air-conditioned and has a gas central heating system. SCHEDULE BY FLOORS: In the basement there is a boiler room, laundry room and auxiliary rooms, and on the ground floor there is a kitchen, a large living room with access to the garden, a dining room and a bathroom. Upstairs there are 4 bedrooms and a bathroom. HOUSE EQUIPMENT: The bathroom has a jacuzzi tub and hydromassage shower. The fireplace is located in the living room. The kitchen is fully equipped with all appliances. The vehicular entrance to the yard is opened by remote control. Video intercom. The bus stop is near the house, approx. 100m. CONDITIONS OF RENT: * Contract for a minimum of one year * Payment: 1 month in advance * Security deposit: 1 monthly rent AGENT: Darko +385 95 351 2309 or darko@zagreb4u.com AGENCY FEE FROM LESSEE: 1 MONTHLY RENT + VAT
naziv_agencije: Zagreb4U - PREMIUM REAL ESTATE, VISOKA KLASA d.o.o.
